General.Name: Beijing Dynamic Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Dynamic Power Co.,LTD engages in the power supply business in China and internationally. It offers power system products, including controllers, rectifiers, series inverters, power module, and embedded power and cabinet systems; electric drive systems, vehicle power, and fuel cells; renewable power systems, such as energy storage and photovoltaic products; IDC products; and energy-saving products. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

2.Name: Mr. Xin Sheng  Wang
2.Title: Exec. Deputy GM, Director of HR Department & Director
